title: Community Pool Spend
description: This is a proposal to fund a multisig wallet for the purpose of covering on-chain relayer operational fees xiti & returniflost will be signers for the multisig, and will work together along relayer operators to create feegrant operations.More info cand found here https://github.com/ChronicNetwork/Governance/tree/main/proposals/05%20-%20Create%20Feegrant%20Wallet%20for%20IBC%20relayer%20Operations
